mapper.sql: id, com_id, page_config_id, programme_name, sys_flg, enableflg, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time

scpp.id as id, scpp.com_id as comId, scpp.page_config_id as pageConfigId, scpp.programme_name as programmeName, scpp.sys_flg as sysFlg, scpp.enableflg as enableflg, scpp.created_by as createdBy, scpp.created_time as createdTime, scpp.updated_by as updatedBy, scpp.updated_time as updatedTime
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_com_page_programme (com_id, page_config_id, programme_name, sys_flg, enableflg, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time) values (#{comId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pageConfigId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{programmeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysFlg, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enableflg, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sys_com_page_programme set com_id=#{comId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, page_config_id=#{pageConfigId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, programme_name=#{programmeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_flg=#{sysFlg, jdbcType=INTEGER}, enableflg=#{enableflg, jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_by=#{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_time=#{createdTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by=#{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_time=#{updatedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
